sentences.sentence: It is well known that congruences on regular semigroups are good.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，正则半群上的同余都是好同余。

sentences.sentence: There exists an irregular semigroups in which joins of good congruences are good.
sentences.translation: 存在所有好余的并都是好余的非正则半群。

sentences.sentence: In this article, we investigate H-related congruences on completely regular semigroups.
sentences.translation: 本文研究了完全正则半群上的H -相关同余。
